title: Timed Rotation
description: Choose a time interval of 2-5 minutes

title: TDD Rotation
description: Rotate after each step in a TDD cylcle

title: Switching Ping Pong
description:
In this rotation Style, the first person has to write a failing test.

After that the second person has to write an production code which makes the testsuite pass. After that the second person writes a failing test.

The next person repeats.

title: Baby Steps
description: Choose a time interval of 2-5 minutes, but if the tests fail after the interval, all code written in this interval must be reverted.

title: Soft Steeplechase
description: Choose a time interval of 2-5 minutes, but if the tests fail after the timeslot, all code written in this slot must be reverted. After a round without revert, the time is decreased until 2 minutes.

title: test && commit || revert
description: Whenever the testsuite is run, the roles change. If any test is red, all changes since the last rotation must be reverted.

title: Hard Steeplechase
description: Choose a time interval of 2-5 minutes, but if the tests fail after the timeslot, all code written in this slot must be reverted. After each round, the time is decreased until 2 minutes.
